titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Overseas Office, Asia
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Overseas Office, Asia FA1673

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-03-13 18:04:32 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Overseas Office, Asia

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Administrative records, program records, correspondence and subject files.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Currently consists of two collections the primary Hanoi Field Office records, and the associated Office Files of Charles R. Bailey.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Ford Foundation has title, copyright and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them.

The Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish material from the collection. Permission to publish extensive excerpts, or material in its entirety, will be referred to the Ford Foundation.
